description: Try our easy to follow Balsamic Onion Tart recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Savoury pie & tart,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Quick & easy lunch,Sesame free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Balsamic Onion Tart Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: baby rocket leaves and snipped chives, to serve

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a frying pan over low heat. Add onion and season with salt. Cook for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally, or until onion is pale golden and softened. Stir in sugar and balsamic vinegar and cook for a further 10 minutes or until caramelised.

Meanwhile, preheat oven to 180Â°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Using a 22cm plate as a guide, cut pastry into a round and place onto tray. Lightly beat one egg and brush over pastry. Bake for 12 minutes or until puffed and golden.

Bring a small pan of water to the boil over medium-high heat. Add white vinegar. Crack remaining egg into a bowl. Stir boiling water to create a whirlpool then pour egg into centre and reduce heat to medium-low. Poach egg for 2-4 minutes or until cooked to your liking.
Place pastry onto a serving plate, spread with onion and top with egg, rocket and chives. Serve.
